name: Rose Bush
description: A classic outdoor plant with vibrant, fragrant blooms. Available in a variety of colors and perfect for garden borders and landscaping.

name: Lavender
description: A fragrant herb known for its purple flowers and calming scent. Attracts pollinators like bees and butterflies and thrives in full sun.

name: Hibiscus
description: A tropical plant with large, colorful flowers. Ideal for adding a vibrant touch to gardens and can attract hummingbirds.

name: Bougainvillea
description: A hardy outdoor plant known for its bright, papery bracts in vivid shades of pink, purple, and red. Prefers full sun and well-drained soil.

name: Jasmine
description: An outdoor plant with sweetly scented white or yellow flowers. Perfect for climbing trellises or walls, requiring full to partial sunlight.

name: Gardenia
description: An evergreen shrub with glossy leaves and creamy white flowers. Known for its strong fragrance and best grown in partial shade.

name: Marigold
description: A low-maintenance annual with bright orange and yellow blooms. Repels pests and is excellent for garden borders or pots.

name: Hydrangea
description: A popular outdoor shrub with large clusters of flowers in shades of pink, blue, or white. Prefers partial shade and well-watered soil.
